sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"例子，事例"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: example, instance, case, sample, illustration, specimen
means: example ： 普通用词，指能代表同类事物性质或一般规律的典型例子。
instance ： 多指用于说明、支持或反证一般事实或理论的事例。
case ： 多指需要加以认真研究的实例，如病例，案例等。
illustration ： 指用来说明、解释某种理论或看法而引用的例证。
specimen可与sample换用，但常指人或物中选出的有代表性部分，或指供科研、化验或检验用的标本。

sentence.Network_en: Have they, for example, demonstrated a commitment to democracy?
sentence.Network_cn: 例如，他们是否已表现出会致力于民主？

sentence.Network_en: The house is a textbook example of medieval domestic architecture.
sentence.Network_cn: 这所房子是典型的中世纪民居。

sentence.Network_en: That's just one example of the kind of experiments you can do.
sentence.Network_cn: 这只不过是你可以做的各种试验中的一例罢了。

jx.jx_en_mean: punish as a warning or deterrent to others

jx.jx_cn_mean: 比如说：举例时用的例子

lj.lj_ly: Wear something simple; for example, a skirt and blouse.
lj.lj_ls: 穿简单的衣服；比如说，一条裙子和一件衬衫

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from Latin exemplum, from eximere 'take out', from ex- 'out' + emere 'take'. Compare with sample

entry.def: An example of something is a particular situation, object, or person which shows that what is being claimed is true.

example.ex: The doctors gave numerous examples of patients being expelled from hospital...
example.tran: 医生们列举了大量病人被逐出医院的实例。

example.ex: Listed below are just a few examples of some of the family benefits available.
example.tran: 下面仅例举了家庭可享受的几种福利。

entry.def: An example of a particular class of objects or styles is something that has many of the typical features of such a class or style, and that you consider clearly represents it.

example.ex: Symphonies 103 and 104 stand as perfect examples of early symphonic construction...
example.tran: 第103和104号交响曲是早期交响乐结构的典型代表。

example.ex: The plaque illustrated in Figure 1 is an example of his work at this time.
example.tran: 图1中的匾额是他这个时期的代表作。

entry.def: You use for example to introduce and emphasize something which shows that something is true.

example.ex: ...'educational toys' that are designed to promote the development of, for example, children's spatial ability...
example.tran: 旨在促进儿童发展，诸如空间能力发展的“教学玩具”

example.ex: Take, for example, the simple sentence: 'The man climbed up the hill'...
example.tran: 以The man climbed up the hill这个简单句为例。

entry.def: If you refer to a person or their behaviour as an example to other people, you mean that he or she behaves in a good or correct way that other people should copy.

example.ex: He is a model professional and an example to the younger lads...
example.tran: 他是个模范的专业人士，是年轻人的榜样。

example.ex: Their example shows us what we are all capable of.
example.tran: 他们作为榜样向我们展示了我们都能做些什么。

entry.def: In a dictionary entry, an example is a phrase or sentence which shows how a particular word is used.

example.ex: The examples are unique to this dictionary.
example.tran: 这些例证是这部词典独有的。

entry.tran: （尤指出于敬意而）学习…的榜样，以…为榜样
entry.def: If you follow someone's example, you behave in the same way as they did in the past, or in a similar way, especially because you admire them.

example.ex: Following the example set by her father, she has fulfilled her role and done her duty...
example.tran: 她以父亲为榜样，完成了任务，履行了职责。

example.ex: She should remember that she is a mother and a public figure and that others may follow her example.
example.tran: 她应该记住自己是位母亲，也是位公众人物，别人可能会以她为榜样。

entry.tran: 惩罚…以警戒他人;杀一儆百
entry.def: To make an example of someone who has done something wrong means to punish them severely as a warning to other people not to do the same thing.

example.ex: Let us at least see our courts make an example of these despicable criminals.
example.tran: 至少让我们看到法庭惩罚这些十恶不赦的罪犯以儆效尤。

entry.def: If you set an example, you encourage or inspire people by your behaviour to behave or act in a similar way.

example.ex: An officer's job was to set an example...
example.tran: 军官的职责就是树立榜样。

example.ex: He is setting an example which other aristocrats and leading Britons should follow.
example.tran: 他为其他贵族和伦敦要人们树立了榜样。

means.word_mean: 1. an item of information that is representative of a type;

sentences.sentence: "this patient provides a typical example of the syndrome"
"he is the very model of a modern major general"

means.word_mean: 4. punishment intended as a warning to others;

sentences.sentence: "they decided to make an example of him"
"it was a case of bad judgment"
"but there is always the famous example of the Smiths"

means.word_mean: 6. a task performed or problem solved in order to develop skill or understanding;

sentences.sentence: "you must work the examples at the end of each chapter in the textbook"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =take/procure,表示"拿,获得,拿走后[变空]"; 2. =large,表示"大"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 充分的,富裕的;宽敞的,宽大的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ampl大+e→adj.充分的,富裕的;宽敞的,宽大的
ex出+ample=ampl拿,获得,拿走后[变空]→拿出作为榜样

stems_affixes.value_cn: 模范, 榜样, 标本
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+empl=ampl拿,获得,拿走后[变空]+ar物→拿出作为榜样

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样品,实例,标本,抽样检查
stems_affixes.word_buile: s=se+ample=ampl拿,获得,拿走后[变空]→分开拿出→标本
ampl大+itude表名词→n.广大;充足;振幅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 举例证明;示范;作……的范例[榜样]
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+empl=ampl拿,获得,拿走后[变空]+ify表动词→拿出作为榜样
s=se+ample=ampl拿,获得,拿走后[变空]→分开拿出→标本

stems_affixes.value_cn: 放大,增强;详述,详加解说

In both of the examples above, speakers from two different cultures have the same gesture, physically, but its meaning differs sharply.
Kodak is an example of a firm that was very much aware that they had to adapt, and spent a lot of money trying to do so, but ultimately failed

However,while talking is largely subconscious and rapid, writing is deliberate and slow, Over time,writers took advantage of this and started crafting long-winded sentences such as this one:The whole engagement lasted above 12 hours, till the gradual retreat of the Persians was changed into a disorderly flight, of which the shameful example was given by the principal leaders and……" No one talks like that casually — or should
Examples like meat and silly are cited to show

While schools emphasize its usefulness-online research in class and instant polling of students, for example - a big part of the attraction is, undoubtedly, that the iPhone is cool and a hit with students.

sentences.en: An example is furnished by him.
It is beyond example in history.
sentences.cn: 这在历史上是史无前例的。

sentences.en: This is a good example of Shelley's lyric poetry.
sentences.cn: 这首诗是雪莱抒情诗的范例。

sentences.en: A good example serves to promote good manners in the young.
sentences.cn: 好榜样可促使青年人讲礼貌。

sentences.en: The teacher made an example of the boy who copied from another student during a test.
sentences.cn: 老师惩罚了考试作弊的学生以儆效尤。

jushi.english: You must take after the best example.
jushi.chinese: 你必须学习最好的榜样。

jushi.english: He gave a few examples for us to follow.
jushi.chinese: 他举出几个供我们学习的榜样。

jushi.english: The old men should try and set the younger children a good example.
jushi.chinese: 老年人应努力为年轻的孩子们树立一个好榜样。
